name: Lightning Redirection
description: Allows a firebender to absorb lightning into their body as energy and release it in a more desirable direction.

name: Air Swipe
description: A crescent-shaped wave of compressed air capable of deflecting colossal projectiles, such as the catapulted flaming rocks often used by the Fire Navy, or redirecting them back to the attacker

name: Wave
description: Make wave from water both to attack and defense from enemy's attack

name: Earth Smash
description: Allows the earthbender to destroy any earthen projectiles sent at them and break out of imprisoning techniques.
